title: Ep 67: Plants, YA Books, and Pretty Little Liars with Jessica Murnane
itunes:title: Ep 67: Plants, YA Books, and Pretty Little Liars with Jessica Murnane
itunes:subtitle: Jessica Murnane, author of One Part Plant and the upcoming Know Your Endo, joins us to talk about gardening, Pretty Little Liars, and the best book she read this year. We also talk about the shows you can “watch with your phone” (and maybe more importa...
description:
Jessica Murnane, author of One Part Plant and the upcoming Know Your Endo, joins us to talk about gardening, Pretty Little Liars, and the best book she read this year. We also talk about the shows you can “watch with your phone” (and maybe more importantly, the ones you can’t), and why we need to scrap the idea of “guilty pleasure chicklit” entirely.


  • Follow Gee Thanks! on Insta: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod! I wanna see you there!
  • Join the Facebook group!: https://www.facebook.com/groups/geethanks/ 
  • Do you like this podcast? LEAVE A REVIEW! It’s the easiest way to support the podcast and it costs you nothing. You have my forever gratitude.

  • Novica Robes: https://amzn.to/2PWz5cb
  • Know Your Endo by Jessica Murnane: https://bookshop.org/a/9875/9780593189832
  • Air Fryer: https://amzn.to/3tcyrFS
